top.title: 'Fear is everywhere': BBC reports from Mexican city turned into war zone by drug cartel feud
top.summary: Culiacán in northern Mexico has seen a surge in violence as rival factions of the Sinaloa cartel battle for control.

top.title: Watch: BBC on streets of Mexican city gripped by deadly cartel violence
top.summary: BBC international correspondent Quentin Sommerville travelled to Culiacán in northern Sinaloa state following an explosion in violence.

top.title: Trump keeps world waiting on his plans for Iran after State of the Union
top.summary: The next round of talks between the US and Iran in Geneva on Thursday could be decisive in the president's decision-making.

top.title: Chip giant Nvidia defies AI concerns with record $215bn revenue
top.summary: Demand for Nvidia chips rose even as the company sets out to create AI products of its own.

top.title: Not even potholes will hold up self-driving cars, UK firm predicts
top.summary: Wayve says it's confident all cars will one day be autonomous, as it announced more than a £1bn in additional investment.

top.title: Gucci criticised for 'AI slop' images ahead of major fashion show
top.summary: Users of social media - where the marketing campaign has been launched - say it is out of keeping with Gucci's reputation for luxury.
